page.title: 07A LOLLIPOP LADY'S DAY
page.content: The lollipop lady works in the week when the children are at school. she starts work at 8.25 a.m. and finishes at 3.55 p.m. She has been working for 12 years. The traffic have 500 yards for stopping when children are crossing to and from Parklands School. She has a change of uniform twice a year. In winter plain white with fluorescent and in summer a white cotton coat with fluorescent cuffs. She enjoys her job because she talks to young and old people. On her board it says STOP! CHILDREN. She earns Â£29.00 a week. When she started it was Â£6.75. She says the cars go much too fast.
